h2_title: How to Get the Elder Armourworm Spirit
content: Speak to Chen Loong and hand over an item called the Proto Armourworm. The Proto Armourworm will turn up in a small basket just above the seed baskets outside Chen Loong's hut. You need to feed the Proto Armourworm three Rice Cocoons to make it grow into a Spirit that you can absorb the next time you visit the village.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Armourworm_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Armourworm Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'How to Get the Elder Armourworm Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Speak to Chen Loong and hand over an item called the Proto Armourworm. The Proto Armourworm will turn up in a small basket just above the seed baskets outside Chen Loong's hut. You need to feed the Proto Armourworm three Rice Cocoons to make it grow into a Spirit that you can absorb the next time you visit the village.
